data.md:MetaData: Transfer function salinity of sediment core EV13-3 taken in 2013 from Eilandvlei, Wilderness, South Africa
One short core (EV13-2: 156 cm length) and two overlapping long cores (EV13-3: 30.22 m, EV13-4: 9.86 m) were retrieved. A composite profile (EV13) with a length of 30.47 m was established.
Microfossils as recorders of Holocene palaeoenvironmental change in Eilandvlei, South Africa
